## Get regions

Notes:

-   Three hospitals are in multiple regions but assigned to New York City:

![](images/paste-1.png)

-   Additionally...

```{r}

DDATA <- here::here("data")
cnames <- c(
  "opcert_2023",
  "hosp_2023",
  "opcert_2024",
  "hosp_2024",
  "dolregion",
  "note"
)
regions <- read_excel(
  fs::path(DDATA, "ex35_data_f.xlsx"),
  sheet = "Region",
  col_names = cnames,
  col_types = "text",
  skip = 2
)
glimpse(regions)

```
